com.jme3.terrain.noise.fractal

Interface Fractal

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Basis
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FractalSum

    public interface Fractal
extends Basis
    Interface for a general fractal basis. Takes any number of basis funcions to work with and a few common parameters for noise fractals
